verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhu kare nṛtya-raṅge
bhāsāila saba loka premera taraṅge

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kare—performs; nṛtya-raṅge—dancing in great pleasure; bhāsāila—inundated; saba—all; loka—people; premera taraṅge—in waves of ecstatic love.
translation: In this way Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu danced in great jubilation and inundated all the people with waves of ecstatic love.
